channel.description: Recent content in Career on Wesley Tian

item.title: Hacking the Resume
item.description: 1. Change your graduation date Imagine it’s currently the fall of 2016, you entered college in the fall 2015 and expect to graduate in spring 2019. A student who has enough credits to be a junior and puts down Dec. 2018 or May 2018 instead of May 2019 will give them an enormous edge in the resume screening process. This is because companies give special treatment to juniors because it is easier to convert them into full-time employees.
